page.title: 06LANDSCAPING OLD RESERVOIRS
page.content: There are two unused reservoirs by the road leading to Haslingden. The North West Water Authority is landscaping these so that people can enjoy the quiet countryside. Any water flowing from the hills will run into a stream which will pass through the small valley. At the moment the site is a very dangerous place with many open man- holes leading into tunnels but it will be a safe and relaxing place in a couple of years time. There is already a picnic site overlooking the empty reservoirs and this will become more popular in the future. Come and see it in 1986 !!!
